summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 5 October to end of Wednesday 6 October GMT
description: Our weather continues to be dominated by an Atlantic low pressure system located to the north of the UK.<br/><br/>Heavy rain forecast for Tuesday morning, then clearing for the afternoon with some sunny spells. Dry and warm on Wednesday. <br/>A fresh 'Atlantic' south-westerly airflow will aid good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
